wikipedia_page.main: Philip James Crampton, commonly known as Phil Crampton, is a British born mountaineer and expedition leader, and owner of the mountaineering company Altitude Junkies.

response: *Phil Crampton (born 1970) – professional alpinist and high-altitude mountaineer
*(Born 1970) Phil Crampton, alpinist and high-altitude mountaineer, was born in Nottingham.

On 28 March Mansikka's friend and climbing partner Phil Crampton organised a rescue mission to try and recover the bodies using helicopter and longline technique, but this was aborted when it was felt the lives of the rescuers were being put in too much danger. Both bodies remain on the mountain where they fell.
